item.title: React Theme Switcher Hook Tutorial
item.description: In this tutorial, I’ll walk you through the process of creating a custom theme switcher hook in React. This hook will allow you to easily implement a dark/light mode in your React applications. Before we get started, make sure you have a basic understanding of React and have a React project set up and ready to work on. By the end of this tutorial, you’ll be able to: Understand the React Hooks: Learn how a React hook works and how they can be used to manage the application state

item.title: Upload Files to AWS S3 Bucket from React Client
item.description: In this blog, we’ll learn how to upload images/videos directly from a React Client to an AWS S3 bucket. The main benefit of this approach is reducing the server load since we don’t need to upload files to our server. We only need access from our server and upload the files directly to AWS S3.
